channel.title: YB's blog - YB's coding journey

item.title: Tricky use case of Array.prototype.map in JS
item.description: If you are familiar with functional programming, Array.prototype.map must be a function that you work with every day. We encountered a tricky use case of it at Cốc Cốc recently, it took me a while to figure out, and here's the answer...
item.author: dydqls5757@gmail.com (Kim Yongbin)
